title: 怎么搞清道夫不清理矿车
author: a1372as
txt_content: 坑爹清道夫会清理已经放下的矿车

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content: 把矿车添加进白名单，不清理他，配置文件修改，不知道有没有指令

replies.author: tsubasa56
replies.txt_content:
配置文件里
#What should be removed during an auto-removal
remove:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: true
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: true←←←←←  改为false
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
